title: Weekly Product Pulse: Nov 3-9, 2025
overview: This week's pulse highlights significant user friction points. We observe critical performance issues with data glitches and a bug impacting video access. Additionally, customers report prolonged delays in F&O segment activation and express frustration over unexpected charges for routine profile updates. Addressing these areas is crucial for improving user experience.

themes.name: Slow, Glitches
themes.summary: Users are experiencing critical intermittent data freezing and a new bug preventing IPO-related video access, leading to significant frustration.

themes.name: Customer Support
themes.summary: Customers face persistent delays and technical hurdles in activating key account segments, indicating a bottleneck in resolution processes.

themes.name: Payments/Statements
themes.summary: Users are unexpectedly charged for basic profile updates like email changes, raising concerns about transparency and fairness in fees.

quotes: price and chart stuck some time (Glitches)
their technical team/system is unable to activate the F&O segment since last 7 days. (Customer Support)
charged extra money for updating your email id. (Payments/Statements)
actions: Prioritize investigation and resolution of the intermittent data freezing and IPO video access bug immediately.
Evaluate and streamline the F&O segment activation process to reduce delays and improve customer support efficiency.
Review the fee structure for basic profile updates and enhance transparency regarding all charges for account management.
